pageProduct.name: Polident Denture Cleanser Whitening Tablets 36
pageProduct.description:
Â 

Information

Why clean your denture with Polident Cleanser instead of toothpaste?

TXT: While dentures are replacements for natural teeth, they are also about 10x softer. This means they can be vulnerable to scratches caused by abrasives found in some toothpaste - leaving gaps for bacteria to grow in. Pretty soon, you could be dealing with bad breath caused by unhygienic dentures or other cleaning methods.

Polident Whitening Cleanser is specially designed to help maintain the original whiteness of your denture.

Brought to you by Polident, the #1 Brand in Denture Care*.

Eat, speak and smile with confidence!

Kills 99.9% of odour-causing bacteria

*in laboratory tests

Helps to maintain good oral hygiene and maintenance of your dentures
